Fees and Insurance


Forms of payment accepted:

Cash, Check, Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.


Insurance accepted:

Blue Cross Blue Shield

*Please check with your insurance company to inquire about coverage prior to your initial appointment.


No-show appointments:

One no-show is provided to each client without a financial fee. Any additional no-show appointments that exceed the one given will be charged a flat rate of $50 for the missed session.


For more information about payment, please contact me at (402) 819-7885
